00052 #ifndef _YOUBOT_SLAVE_MAILBOX_MESSAGE_H
00053 #define _YOUBOT_SLAVE_MAILBOX_MESSAGE_H
00054 
00055 #include <ethercattype.h>
00056 #include <string>
00057 #include <time.h>
00058 
00059 namespace youbot {
00060 
00061   /// Output part from the EtherCAT mailbox message of the youBot slaves
00062 
00063   struct mailboxOutputBuffer {
00064     uint8 moduleAddress; //0 = Drive  1 = Gripper
00065     uint8 commandNumber;
00066     uint8 typeNumber;
00067     uint8 motorNumber; //always zero
00068     uint32 value; //MSB first!
00069 
00070     mailboxOutputBuffer() : moduleAddress(0), commandNumber(0), typeNumber(0), motorNumber(0), value(0) {};
00071   } __attribute__((__packed__));
00072 
00073   /// Input part from the EtherCAT mailbox message of the youBot slaves
00074 
00075   struct mailboxInputBuffer {
00076     uint8 replyAddress;
00077     uint8 moduleAddress;
00078     uint8 status; //(e.g. 100 means “no error”)
00079     uint8 commandNumber;
00080     uint32 value; //MSB first!
00081 
00082     mailboxInputBuffer() : replyAddress(0), moduleAddress(0), status(0), commandNumber(0), value(0) {};
00083   } __attribute__((__packed__));
00084 
00085   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00086   /// EtherCAT mailbox message of the youBot slaves 
00087   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00088 
00089  class YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg {
00090   public:
00091 
00092     mailboxOutputBuffer stctOutput;
00093     mailboxInputBuffer stctInput;
00094 
00095     // Constructor
00096     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg() {
00097       slaveNumber = 1000;
00098     }
00099 
00100     // Constructor
00101 
00102     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg(unsigned int slaveNo) {
00103       slaveNumber = slaveNo;
00104     }
00105     // Copy-Constructor
00106 
00107     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& copy) {
00108       stctOutput = copy.stctOutput;
00109       stctInput = copy.stctInput;
00110       slaveNumber = copy.slaveNumber;
00111       parameterName = copy.parameterName;
00112     }
00113     
00114 
00115     // Destructor
00116 
00117     ~YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg() {
00118     }
00119 
00120     // assignment operator
00121 
00122     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg & operator=(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& copy) {
00123       stctOutput = copy.stctOutput;
00124       stctInput = copy.stctInput;
00125       slaveNumber = copy.slaveNumber;
00126       parameterName = copy.parameterName;
00127       return *this;
00128     }
00129     
00130     std::string parameterName;
00131     unsigned int slaveNumber;
00132   };
00133   
00134   
00135   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00136   /// EtherCAT mailbox message of the youBot slaves (thread safe)
00137   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00138   class YouBotSlaveMailboxMsgThreadSafe {
00139   public:
00140 
00141     DataObjectLockFree<mailboxOutputBuffer> stctOutput;
00142     DataObjectLockFree<mailboxInputBuffer> stctInput;
00143 
00144     // Constructor
00145     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsgThreadSafe() {
00146       slaveNumber.Set(1000);
00147     }
00148 
00149     // Constructor
00150 
00151     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsgThreadSafe(unsigned int slaveNo) {
00152       slaveNumber.Set(slaveNo);
00153     }
00154     // Copy-Constructor
00155 
00156     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsgThreadSafe(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsgThreadSafe& copy) {
00157       mailboxOutputBuffer tempStctOutput;
00158       mailboxInputBuffer tempStctInput;
00159       std::string tempParameterName;
00160       unsigned int SlaveNumber;
00161       
00162       
00163       copy.stctOutput.Get(tempStctOutput);
00164       stctOutput.Set(tempStctOutput);
00165       
00166       copy.stctInput.Get(tempStctInput);
00167       stctInput.Set(tempStctInput);
00168       
00169       copy.slaveNumber.Get(SlaveNumber);
00170       slaveNumber.Set(SlaveNumber);
00171       
00172       copy.parameterName.Get(tempParameterName);
00173       parameterName.Set(tempParameterName);
00174     }
00175 
00176     // Destructor
00177 
00178     ~YouBotSlaveMailboxMsgThreadSafe() {
00179     }
00180 
00181     // assignment operator
00182 
00183     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsgThreadSafe & operator=(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsgThreadSafe& copy) {
00184       mailboxOutputBuffer tempStctOutput;
00185       mailboxInputBuffer tempStctInput;
00186       std::string tempParameterName;
00187       unsigned int SlaveNumber;
00188       
00189       
00190       copy.stctOutput.Get(tempStctOutput);
00191       stctOutput.Set(tempStctOutput);
00192       
00193       copy.stctInput.Get(tempStctInput);
00194       stctInput.Set(tempStctInput);
00195       
00196       copy.slaveNumber.Get(SlaveNumber);
00197       slaveNumber.Set(SlaveNumber);
00198       
00199       copy.parameterName.Get(tempParameterName);
00200       parameterName.Set(tempParameterName);
00201       return *this;
00202     }
00203 
00204     DataObjectLockFree<std::string> parameterName;
00205 
00206     DataObjectLockFree<unsigned int> slaveNumber;
00207   };
